short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance the accessibility of the Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pathway is a Chrome extension designed to improve Web accessibility automatically. It scans Web pages for common accessibility issues and applies fixes in real-time, making the Web more inclusive for users with disabilities.
